text: 40|10|niccayamāka evarkaḷ nirākarittu viṭṭārkaḷō, avarkaḷai nōkki, ‘‘iṉṟaiya tiṉam nīṅkaḷ uṅkaḷ ātmāvai (nintittuk) kōpippatai viṭa, (uṅkaḷ mītu) allāhvuṭaiya (nintaṉaiyum) kōpamum mikap periyatākum. Ēṉeṉṟāl, nīṅkaḷ nampikkaiyiṉ pakkam aḻaikkappaṭṭa camayattil, atai nirākarittu viṭṭīrkaḷ'' eṉṟu avarkaḷai nōkki captamiṭṭuk kūṟappaṭum
